dmca.title: Copyright Infringement - Legal Correspondence attached
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Mauny Wright [mailto:Mauny.Wright@bbc.co.uk] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 23, 2005 11:56 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement - Legal Correspondence attached
Importance: High

FAO:
Lance Crosby, Esq. 
Chief Operating Officer 


Please see attached correspondence.

Mauny Wright
Brand Protection Lawyer
BBC Worldwide, Room E143, Woodlands, 80 Wood Lane, London, W12 OTT
T: +44 (0)20 8433 2233  F: +44 (0)20 8433 2414  
mailto:mauny.wright@bbc.co.uk   http://www.bbcworldwide.com
 <<isp takedown reqEEworldwide.doc>>
This e-mail (and any attachments) is confidential and may contain personal
views which are not the views of the BBC unless specifically stated.
If you have received it in error, please delete it from your system. Do not
use, copy or disclose the information in any way nor act in reliance on it
and notify the sender immediately. Please note that the BBC monitors e-mails
sent or received.
Further communication will signify your consent to this.

FAO: Lance Crosby, Esq. 
Chief Operating Officer
The Planet.com Internet services Inc
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas
75207 
Texas
US

23 March 2005
By e-mail and post:  abuse@theplanet.com

COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

This notice complies with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
